description:
What's the difference between a person who can write copy and a person who can't?

It's the same as the difference between a person with a successful pitch and one without: One makes money while the other doesn't.

Feel like your website could be selling more of your product or service?

The problem - 80% of the time - IS IN THE SALES COPY.

Copywriters are an actual industry, some people make money by writing other people's copy.

By taking this this course, not only you'll be able to finally start writing your own copy, but you'll be able to save thousands of dollars by making something every marketer making the internet their business should, work on their own copy.

After you learn the skill you'll be able to craft sales letters that convert for your website, product/service, email campaigns, or create other people's copy for a profit.

Avoid the common blunders other people make when writing sales copy, learn how to build trust first with your readers.

Master the art of difital persuasion to make your copy seem objective and yet is truly one-sided toward your product/service

Structuring and organize your copy is crucial, With this structure, you can trigger the actions you want your prospects to take. Whether it's a purchase or an email subscription, you can choose this outcome by writing effective copy that flows.

The skill of copywriting will be passed to you alongside:

  • Walkthroughs and examples of designing and writing a live sales page.
  • Lectures on the overarching and fundamental principles of copywriting
  • People getting it wrong: Websites with poor copy
  • Critiques of examples from my personal swipe file (a file full of sales letters).
  • Powerpoint lectures outlining the essential copywriting strategies and tactics to start writing not good, but great copy.
  • PDF files with questions to guide your writing

There's also the copywriters discussion forum where we will be able to answer all of your questions regarding copy. Also active students get a FREE and PERSONAL REVIEW of your sales letter (you just need to ask in the discussion forums) â€“ normally it would cost about $100.

We also give out assignments, which are evaluated and why not, graded. The more assignment you deliver, the more times we can review your copy.

Because the skill you are learning is writing-related, you should learn through writing, and remember i'm offering one-by-one assistance by critiquing your sales copy.

The skill you will learn in this class is not theoretical. It is a skill that requires actual writing.

Learning how to write your own copy is essential and just like life itself, you have to keep pushing yourself and work past your mistakes until you get it right.

We'll just give you the training you need to do so.

SHOUTING OUT TO ALL CURRENT AND ASPIRING COPYWRITERS

If you can think of a better title for this course, send it on a message and get this course half price, regardless of the discount you may already see in the price. Just send us this link along with the new title.
title: Write Great Copy: Headlines and Sales Letters
